synopsis.text: Kohinata Hikari is an upbeat, optimistic high school girl who loves scuba diving and grew up in a small seaside town. Her best friend Ooki Futaba moved from Tokyo and is more reserved, but Hikari helped draw her out of her shell. Since meeting at school, the two opposites have become inseparable. Futaba took the open water diver exam with Hikari's encouragement and passed. Now she aims to get her advanced certification. Hikari supports her friend while sharing her passion for the joy and wonder of the underwater world. Together, whether diving or engaging in everyday activities, the two find happiness and magic in life's smaller moments. Their high school days filled with friendship and adventure are just beginning.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
